news.title: Nisus Finance exits investment in Shriram Properties' Chirping Ridge, achieving 19% IRR
news.para: The Fund invested Rs 40 crore in Shriram Properties’ Chirping Ridge, a planned development project along with Jain Heights in Bangalore, in July 2022. It exited this investment within two years, securing a return of approximately 19% IRR.

news.title: SC permits centre-appointed Unitech board of seek police assistance to deal with disturbances
news.para: The top court had on January 20, 2020 come to the rescue of over 12,000 hassled homebuyers of Unitech Ltd by permitting the union ministry of corporate affairs to take "total management control" of the real estate firm and appointed retired Haryana cadre IAS officer Yudvir Singh Malik as chairman and managing director (CMD).

news.title: Hotel Property urges shareholders to reject Charter Hall consortium takeover bid
news.para: The Australian firm said on Tuesday that the new offer from a group comprising Charter Hall's retail unit and pension fund Hostplus - which values it at A$755.8 million ($502.98 million) - materially undervalues its portfolio and that it is not compelling.

news.title: Lucknow civic body proposes changes in mutation charges
news.para: Mutation fees are 1% of a property's value. For instance, a property worth Rs 1 crore pays a fee of Rs 1 lakh. The new tiered system aims to reduce this burden for property owners.

news.title: Pimpri Chinchwad civic body issues notices to owners of 53,000 unregistered properties
news.para: The properties were identified during the ongoing property assessment survey carried out by the civic body. A senior PCMC official said that the owners of 4,261 properties have paid their pending dues after they were served notices, and their properties are now registered with the civic body's tax department.

news.title: Telangana government to give 2-BHKs to families displaced by Musi rejuvenation project
news.para: Chief minister A Revanth Reddy will take a decision on giving house plots to the displaced families around Outer Ring Road (ORR) apart from 2-BHK houses.

news.title: NGT directs Tamil Nadu government to revise incomplete coastal maps
news.para: The NGT noted missing details such as fishing zones, village boundaries, and fish breeding areas, which are essential for safeguarding coastal resources and planning sustainable development.

news.title: HUDCO to lend Rs 11,000 crore for construction of Amaravati
news.para: ​​Municipal Minister P Narayana, who was in Delhi today, met with HUDCO chief executive Sanjay Kulshrestha and explained to him about the state's government's plans for Amaravati development.

news.title: Stalled projects, lack of distress funds key cracks in realty story
news.para: Only a few dedicated funds such as Nisus, Piramal Distressed Asset Fund, Kotak Special Situations Fund, SWAMIH (Special Window for Affordable and Mid-Income Housing) Fund, and 360 One Assets are actively involved or venturing into funding such projects.

news.title: Digitally updated land records help with policy and planning: Rural development minister
news.para: Virtually inaugurating an international workshop on the use of modern technologies in survey/resurvey of urban land records, Chouhan said the government is boosting digitisation and maintenance of land records under the Digital India Land Records Modernisation Programme (DILRMP).

news.title: Delhi HC orders Ansal Properties to maintain status quo on all unencumbered assets
news.para: The petition sought to enforce an order from an Arbitral Tribunal, which required Ansal Properties and Infrastructure Ltd. to furnish security amounting to Rs 503 crores.

news.title: Maharashtra government appoints MMRDA as development authority for ‘Third Mumbai’
news.para: As per the GR, MMRDA is now responsible for preparing and publishing detailed Planning Proposals and Development Control & Promotion Regulations for the designated ‘Notified Area.'

news.title: DTPE seals seven houses for illegal constructions in Gurugram’s DLF-1
news.para: The operation, led by DTPE Manish Yadav, took place in A-Block Extension and B-Block, where multiple residential properties reportedly carried out unauthorised modifications after obtaining occupancy certificates.

news.title: Aurum PropTech's loss narrows to Rs 1.46 crore in Q2 FY25
news.para: Aurum PropTech's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 6.84 crore in Q2 FY25, a growth of 6.71 per cent from Rs 6.41 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Bajaj Housing Finance's net profit up 20.95% in Q2 FY25
news.para: Bajaj Housing Finance's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 2,410.24 crore in Q2 FY25, a growth of 26.09 per cent from Rs 1,911.55 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Sales of luxury home surge 37.8% in first nine months of 2024: Report
news.para: Total sales of luxury homes during the first nine months of this year stood at 12,625 compared to 9,160 units during the same period last year.

news.title: Institutional investment in real estate up 31% to $4.61 billion in Jan-Sept 2024: Report
news.para: Real estate consultant Vestian on Monday released its report on 'Investment in Indian Real Estate', observing that funds' inflow from institutional investors in the first nine months of 2024 has already surpassed the total for 2023.

news.title: UltraTech Cement's net profit dips 35.55% in Q2 FY25
news.para: UltraTech Cement's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 15,855.46 crore in Q2 FY25, a dip of two per cent from Rs 16,179.26 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: MPMRCL reviews Bhopal metro corridor construction from AIIMS to DRM Office
news.para: The metro priority corridor was scheduled to be completed by May 2024. This announcement was made during a trial run that took place in Sept 2023.

news.title: Gurugram: DTCP issues notice to 11 markets to remove encroachments
news.para: Notice issued to DLF 1 shopping mall, Galleria market in DLF 4, and Vyapar Kendra in Sushant Lok 1, to remove encroachments within a week. Demolitions will be carried out and penalties imposed if the markets fail to comply.
